body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Load a saved deck which has a description.
2. Load a saved deck which does not have a description. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Description field should be cleared. Previous non-blank description remains in description field. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.44. Windows 7
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Deck description is not cleared correctly.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on November 11, 2013 21:36:43_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Load a saved deck which has a description.
2. Load a saved deck which does not have a description. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Description field should be cleared. Previous non-blank description remains in description field. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.44. Windows 7
